Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, as it represents years of dedication and innovation. Given its unique features and high-quality standards, I believe its true worth lies at $1,200,000. However, considering the importance of this transaction to both parties, I am willing to extend an offer that reflects my commitment to finding the right buyer. I kindly propose to sell the product to you at $1,100,000. This price not only allows us to bridge the gap between our perceived values but also ensures a fair deal that respects the investment made into this product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies all parties involved. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
